name: ChaiOne
description:
ChaiOne is a Digital Studio focused on creating innovative, beautiful digital solutions that solve complex business problems of large enterprises, with a specific focus on Industrial use cases.
Headquartered in Houston, TX, ChaiOne builds solutions that help companies make significant advances on areas such as Sales Enablement, Field Operations, Digital Plant, Safety and Security, Inspections and Incident Management.
ChaiOne's services span Mobile Strategy, User Research, User Experience Design, iOS Development, Android Development, Predix Development, Amazon Web Services and Heroku expertise and a Program Management office to lead digital transformation initiatives.
